## StateNode class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StateNode<TContext extends MachineContext = MachineContext, TEvent extends EventObject = EventObject> 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [config](./xstate.statenode.config.md) |  | [StateNodeConfig](./xstate.statenodeconfig.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // actions [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // actors [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // output [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // guards [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // delays [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>&gt; | The raw config used to create the machine. |
|  [definition](./xstate.statenode.definition.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [StateNodeDefinition](./xstate.statenodedefinition.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt; | The well-structured state node definition. |
|  [description?](./xstate.statenode.description.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ |
|  [entry](./xstate.statenode.entry.md) |  | [UnknownAction](./xstate.unknownaction.md)<></>\[\] | The action(s) to be executed upon entering the state node. |
|  [events](./xstate.statenode.events.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Array&lt;TEvent\['type'\]&gt; | All the event types accepted by this state node and its descendants. |
|  [exit](./xstate.statenode.exit.md) |  | [UnknownAction](./xstate.unknownaction.md)<></>\[\] | The action(s) to be executed upon exiting the state node. |
|  [history](./xstate.statenode.history.md) |  | false \| 'shallow' \| 'deep' | <p>The type of history on this state node. Can be:</p><p>- <code>'shallow'</code> - recalls only top-level historical state value - <code>'deep'</code> - recalls historical state value at all levels</p> |
|  [id](./xstate.statenode.id.md) |  | string | The unique ID of the state node. |
|  [initial](./xstate.statenode.initial.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [InitialTransitionDefinition](./xstate.initialtransitiondefinition.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt; |  |
|  [invoke](./xstate.statenode.invoke.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Array&lt;[InvokeDefinition](./xstate.invokedefinition.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, [ProvidedActor](./xstate.providedactor.md)<></>, [ParameterizedObject](./xstate.parameterizedobject.md)<></>, [ParameterizedObject](./xstate.parameterizedobject.md)<></>, string&gt;&gt; | The logic invoked as actors by this state node. |
|  [key](./xstate.statenode.key.md) |  | string | The relative key of the state node, which represents its location in the overall state value. |
|  [machine](./xstate.statenode.machine.md) |  | [StateMachine](./xstate.statemachine.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, any, // actors any, // input [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // output [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // guards [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // delays [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>, // tags [TODO](./xstate.todo.md)<></>&gt; | The root machine node. |
|  [meta?](./xstate.statenode.meta.md) |  | any | _(Optional)_ The meta data associated with this state node, which will be returned in State instances. |
|  [on](./xstate.statenode.on.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [TransitionDefinitionMap](./xstate.transitiondefinitionmap.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt; | The mapping of events to transitions. |
|  [order](./xstate.statenode.order.md) |  | number | The order this state node appears. Corresponds to the implicit document order. |
|  [output?](./xstate.statenode.output.md) |  | [Mapper](./xstate.mapper.md)<></>&lt;[MachineContext](./xstate.machinecontext.md)<></>, [EventObject](./xstate.eventobject.md)<></>, unknown, [EventObject](./xstate.eventobject.md)<></>&gt; \| [NonReducibleUnknown](./xstate.nonreducibleunknown.md) | _(Optional)_ The output data sent with the "xstate.done.state.\_id\_" event if this is a final state node. |
|  [ownEvents](./xstate.statenode.ownevents.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Array&lt;TEvent\['type'\]&gt; | <p>All the events that have transitions directly from this state node.</p><p>Excludes any inert events.</p> |
|  [parent?](./xstate.statenode.parent.md) |  | [StateNode](./xstate.statenode.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt; | _(Optional)_ The parent state node. |
|  [path](./xstate.statenode.path.md) |  | string\[\] | The string path from the root machine node to this node. |
|  [states](./xstate.statenode.states.md) |  | [StateNodesConfig](./xstate.statenodesconfig.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt; | The child state nodes. |
|  [tags](./xstate.statenode.tags.md) |  | string\[\] |  |
|  [transitions](./xstate.statenode.transitions.md) |  | Map&lt;string, [TransitionDefinition](./xstate.transitiondefinition.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent&gt;\[\]&gt; |  |
|  [type](./xstate.statenode.type.md) |  | 'atomic' \| 'compound' \| 'parallel' \| 'final' \| 'history' | <p>The type of this state node:</p><p>- <code>'atomic'</code> - no child state nodes - <code>'compound'</code> - nested child state nodes (XOR) - <code>'parallel'</code> - orthogonal nested child state nodes (AND) - <code>'history'</code> - history state node - <code>'final'</code> - final state node</p> |
